title: Week In Review: Walker And Burke Tied, John Doe Emails, Campaign Visits, And More
teaser: With less than two weeks before Election Day, the Wisconsin Survey from Wisconsin Public Radio and St. Norbert College shows Gov. Scott Walker and Mary Burke tied. In the Week in Review, Joy Cardinâ€™s guests of opposing perspectives discuss the latest issues in the race, including the release of 16,000 John Doe emails , presidential visits , new campaign ads and more.
